amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds in the bill to implement or enforce sections 193 or 414 which relate to limiting air and ferry travel to Cuba.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to administer, implement, or enforce section 193 or section 414 of this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 247, 1 Present (Roll no. 306).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 247, 1 Present (Roll no. 306).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A049) offered by Ms. Lee.
